summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prenotazioni page (/prenotazioni). All core functionality working perfectly including hero section, boat selection cards, booking process timeline, payment/requirements info, weather policies, location details with Google Maps, and final CTA section. Mobile responsiveness and navigation work flawlessly.
passed_tests: Prenotazioni page loads with hero section and title 'Prenota il tuo Gommone a La Maddalena'
All 3 boat selection cards visible with correct info (5.50m BWA, 6m Alson, Joker Boat 7m)
5.50m boat card links correctly to /prezzi page
6m boat card links correctly to /prezzi page
Joker Boat card has functional WhatsApp CTA with correct URL
Price notice banner displays with working link to 'listino completo 2026'
4-step booking process timeline fully displayed with all steps (1-4)
Payment info card visible with payment details and options
Requirements card visible with rental requirements and age restrictions
Weather policy refund card with green border (turquoise) styling
Personal cancellation card with amber border and warning styling
Location section displays all 5 info items (address, walking, ferry, hours, contacts)
Google Maps embed present and functioning correctly
'Apri in Google Maps' button visible with external link attributes
Final CTA section with both WhatsApp and call buttons functional
Navigation shows Prenotazioni as active (turquoise highlighting)
Mobile responsive layout works correctly across all sections
All buttons clickable and functional on mobile devices
Navigation between pages works correctly (tested /prezzi navigation)
External links properly configured with security attributes (_blank, noopener noreferrer)
Phone links properly formatted with tel: protocol
Hover interactions work on interactive elements
All sections properly visible and positioned
Boat card images load correctly with proper alt text
ScrollReveal animations working (no console errors)
WhatsApp URLs formatted correctly with Italian messaging
